speaker: Host (Ava)
text: Welcome back to the SportsCenter Showdown! What a showdown we had today!

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: Absolutely, Ava! The Steelers and Browns always bring the heat!

speaker: Host (Ava)
text: Let’s jump right into it! The Browns struck first in the first quarter!

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: Jameis Winston to Jerry Jeudy for a stunning 35-yard touchdown! Wow!

speaker: Host (Ava)
text: What a throw! But hold on, the Browns lost CB Mike Ford Jr. to concussion protocol.

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: That’s a tough loss! Their defense was already on shaky ground!

speaker: Host (Ava)
text: Moving to the second quarter, Keeanu Benton made a game-changing interception!

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: He picked off a screen pass meant for Nick Chubb! Talk about a momentum shift!

speaker: Host (Ava)
text: And then Najee Harris punched it in for a 1-yard touchdown! Classic Steelers!

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: Steelers took the lead and never looked back! That’s how you play football!

speaker: Host (Ava)
text: But wait, Dustin Hopkins missed a 38-yard field goal! What was he thinking?

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: Maybe he was trying to impress the fans in the parking lot? Just kidding!

speaker: Host (Ava)
text: Third quarter rolls around, and guess what? Another missed field goal by Hopkins!

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: He’s feeling the pressure! But Russell Wilson? He was unfazed!

speaker: Host (Ava)
text: Wilson connected with Van Jefferson for a 10-yard touchdown! Boom!

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: That extended the lead to 20-7! The Steelers were rolling!

speaker: Host (Ava)
text: And let’s not forget Elandon Roberts stopping Jerome Ford on fourth down!

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: That was a statement play! Defense wins championships, right?

speaker: Host (Ava)
text: In the fourth quarter, Wilson found Pat Freiermuth for another touchdown!

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: Sealing the deal! Steelers win it 27-7! What a performance!

speaker: Host (Ava)
text: But injuries plagued both teams. Ogunjobi and Jackson left the game. Ouch!

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: Injuries are part of the game, but they can change everything!

speaker: Host (Ava)
text: What’s next for both teams? The Steelers look strong heading forward!

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: And the Browns need to regroup fast! Can they bounce back?

speaker: Host (Ava)
text: That’s the million-dollar question! Thanks for tuning in, folks!

speaker: Guest (Alex)
text: Catch us next time for more thrilling sports action! Stay tuned!
